video_prompt: Luminescent cosmic dust swirls around a glowing, liquid rose. Petals undulate, shifting colors from pale blue to deep indigo with sparkling specks. Leaves unfurl, shimmering silver-blue, as warm starlight pulses from the infinitely swirling background.
image_prompt: A single, stylized rose crafted from luminous blue liquid light and cosmic dust, with sparkling crystalline speckles on its translucent petals, set against a deep, ethereal nebula background with scattered glowing stars. Magical, serene, and exquisitely beautiful.
refined_video_prompt: Cosmic dust actively swirls and gleams. A liquid rose subtly flows and pulsates. Petals continuously undulate, their hues morphing from pale blue to deep indigo, dynamically sparkling. Leaves unfurl and constantly shimmer silver-blue. Warm starlight steadily pulses against the infinitely swirling background.
